contents.text: Bridging the gap between non-technical stakeholders and the technical team is crucial for successful product engineering. A technical liaison plays a key role in facilitating communication and understanding between these two groups. By translating complex technical concepts into layman's terms and vice versa, the technical liaison ensures that everyone is on the same page and working towards common goals.
